verses.text: \w Righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add art\add* thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* with thee: yet let me \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* with thee of \add thy\add* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: Wherefore doth the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*? \add wherefore\add* are all they \w happy|strong="H7951"\w* that deal \w very|strong="H0899"\w* \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*?\f + \fr 12.1 \ft talk…: or, reason the case with thee\f*

Thou hast \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* them, yea, they have taken \w root|strong="H8327"\w*: they \w grow|strong="H3212"\w*, yea, they bring \w forth|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: thou \add art\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* in their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and far \w from|strong="H7350"\w* their \w reins|strong="H3629"\w*.\f + \fr 12.2 \ft they grow: Heb. they go on\f*

But thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* me: thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* me, and \w tried|strong="H0974"\w* mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* toward thee: pull them \w out|strong="H5423"\w* like \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* for the \w slaughter|strong="H2878"\w*, and \w prepare|strong="H6942"\w* them for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft toward…: Heb. with thee\f*

How long shall the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, and the \w herbs|strong="H6212"\w* of every \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*, for the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein? the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* are \w consumed|strong="H5595"\w*, and the \w birds|strong="H5775"\w*; because they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* our last \w end|strong="H0319"\w*.

¶ If thou hast \w run|strong="H7323"\w* with the \w footmen|strong="H7273"\w*, and they have \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w* thee, then how canst thou \w contend|strong="H8474"\w* with \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*? and \add if\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \add wherein\add* thou \w trustedst|strong="H0982"\w*, \add they wearied thee\add*, then how wilt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w swelling|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*?

For even thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, even they have dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* with thee; yea, they have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* a \w multitude|strong="H4392"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee: \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* them not, though they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* fair \w words|strong="H2896"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 12.6 \ft they have called…: or, they cried after thee fully\f*\f + \fr 12.6 \ft fair…: Heb. good things\f*

¶ I have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, I have \w left|strong="H5203"\w* mine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*; I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* the dearly \w beloved|strong="H3033"\w* of my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of her \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft the dearly…: Heb. the love\f*

Mine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* is unto me as a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* in the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*; it crieth \w out|strong="H5414"\w* against me: therefore have I \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* it.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft crieth…: or, yelleth: Heb. giveth out his voice\f*

Mine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* \add is\add* unto me \add as\add* a \w speckled|strong="H6641"\w* \w bird|strong="H5861"\w*, the \w birds|strong="H5861"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add are\add* against her; \w come|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w come|strong="H0857"\w* to \w devour|strong="H0402"\w*.\f + \fr 12.9 \ft speckled: or, taloned\f*\f + \fr 12.9 \ft come to: or, cause them to come to\f*

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w pastors|strong="H7462"\w* have \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* my \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, they have \w trodden|strong="H0947"\w* my \w portion|strong="H2513"\w* under \w foot|strong="H0947"\w*, they have \w made|strong="H5414"\w* my \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w portion|strong="H2513"\w* a \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft pleasant…: Heb. portion of desire\f*

They have \w made|strong="H7760"\w* it \w desolate|strong="H8076"\w*, \add and being\add* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* it \w mourneth|strong="H0056"\w* unto me; the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is made \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, because no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w layeth|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* to \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

The \w spoilers|strong="H7703"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon all high \w places|strong="H8205"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: for the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* from the \add one\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* even to the \add other\add* \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: no \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall have \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

They have \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, but shall \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w*: they have put themselves to \w pain|strong="H2470"\w*, \add but\add* shall not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*: and they shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of your \w revenues|strong="H8393"\w* because of the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.13 \ft they shall: or, ye shall\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* against all mine \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, that \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* which I have caused my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w*; Behold, I will pluck them \w out|strong="H5428"\w* of their \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and pluck \w out|strong="H5428"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

And it shall come to pass, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that I have plucked them \w out|strong="H5428"\w* I will \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and have \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* on them, and will bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, if they will \w diligently|strong="H3925"\w* \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*; as they \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*; then shall they be \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

But if they will not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w*, I will \w utterly|strong="H5428"\w* pluck \w up|strong="H5428"\w* and \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* that \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
